meanings.definition: A minor malfunction or irregularity in a system.
meanings.sent1: The computer technician fixed the glitches in the software.
meanings.sent2: The glitches in the game made it hard to play.
meanings.sent3: The glitches in the TV remote made it change channels randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her plan had a few glitches, but she managed to make it work.
meanings.sent5: The glitches in the road caused the car to bump around.

meanings.sent1: The designer worked hard to eliminate all the glitches in the dress.
meanings.sent2: The glitches in the mirror distorted her reflection.
meanings.sent3: The glitches in the painting made it look like a modern art piece.
meanings.sent4: His flawless appearance hid the glitches in his personality.
meanings.sent5: The glitches in the diamond reduced its value significantly.

meanings.definition: To experience a sudden malfunction or irregularity.
meanings.sent1: She glitches whenever she tries to open that file.
meanings.sent2: The system glitches whenever too many users are online.
meanings.sent3: He glitches at the worst possible moments, like during presentations.
meanings.sent4: Their communication glitched, causing confusion among the team.
meanings.sent5: The robot glitched and started moving in circles unexpectedly.
